title: I'm waiting...
body:
For the dreaded "Rek'Sai's release has been delayed due to a bug, thank you for your patience."

Of course I'm hoping that isn't the case.

replies.body:
Looks like Rito is getting prepared to release him.

{{champion:421}}
Lucky it wasn't Vel'koz otherwise there will be a lot of overlapping puns

It'll happen. That's what Riot does. Just look at where Kalista is at the moment. A bit OP on release, buffs sitting on the PBE, just went on free rotation and they've disabled her due to 'bugs'. Well played Riot, well played.
Kalista is horrible. So it is good they disabled her.
I hope not, plus Rek'sai is a bit more straightforward than previous champion releases such as Kalista, Azir and Gnar and her kits a bit more simple.
